alert.note: Alert for Lake Of The Woods (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 3:16PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lake of the Woods County through 415 PM CDT... At 312 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a shower near Garden Island State Recreation Area, or 51 miles northeast of Roseau, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could increase wave action, in addition to already choppy wave action on the lake. Locations impacted include... Lake of the Woods, Oak Island, Flag Island, Penasse and Garden Island State Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on Lake of the Woods, be prepared for hazardous waves. Consider seeking shelter away from open water if on a small craft vessel.
